import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./MenuPage.css"; import APIService from "../../Services/APIService"; import CakeInfoModal from "../CakeInfoModal"; function MenuPage() { const [selectedCake, setSelectedCake] = useState(null); const takeIdOfCake = async (cakeId) => { const cakeInfo = await APIService.getCakebyId(cakeId); setSelectedCake(cakeInfo); }; const [cakes, setCakes] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { async function fetchCakes() { try { const cakesData = await APIService.getAll(); setCakes(cakesData); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching cakes:", error); } } fetchCakes(); }, []); return (

  • Cakes
    • Napaleon
    • Dairy girl
    • Red velvet
    • Three chocolates
    • Mango-passion fruit
    • Snickers
    • Honey cake
    • pavlova
  • Dessert
  • Bento
  • Cupcake
  • Eclairs
  • Tartalets
  • Rolls
  • Japanese pancake
  • Mochi
{cakes.map((cake) => (
takeIdOfCake(cake.id)} >
{cake.title}

Difficulty: {cake.difficulty}

))}
{selectedCake && ( setSelectedCake(null)} /> )}
); } export default MenuPage;
